properties.Observation: It has been constructed by the Agricultural Service as a cultivation well. But due to scarcity of water, villagers are currently using this for their daily water needs. And the water pump is not working properly.

properties.Observation: Located on a Forest reserve. The pipes from this spring to the stock tank are consatantly brocken due to natural causes. (Fire/Wild animal)

properties.Observation: Located on private land. Currently there is an informal well and one family consumes water
properties.Description: Planting Bamboo species and Vetiver grass or Riparian speciesVegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m gridImprovements to the existing well including deepening the sameContingencies 10%

properties.Observation: Drinking water is very scarce in this area during dry season.
properties.Description: Drilling of tube well (5m deep) with supplying and fixing of 0.5 HP x 4" Dia tube well pump including all necessery connections and constructing a protective cell for the pump and mounting the same to good working orderContingencies 10%
